>>> from plib.stdlib import Singleton
>>> s1 = Singleton()
>>> s2 = Singleton()
>>> s1 is s2
True
>>> class A(Singleton):
...     pass
... 
>>> class B(Singleton):
...     pass
... 
>>> a = A()
>>> b = B()
>>> a is s1
False
>>> b is s1
False
>>> a is b
False
>>> aa = A()
>>> bb = B()
>>> a is aa
True
>>> b is bb
True
>>> class C(Singleton):
...     def _init(self):
...         print "_init called."
...     def __init__(self):
...         print "__init__ called."
... 
>>> c1 = C()
_init called.
__init__ called.
>>> c2 = C()
__init__ called.
>>> c1 is c2
True
